thread.title: Leah
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Leah

author: Leah
title: Leah
text: Very well organized with videos to break up the reading. The open-book quizzes helped solidify the material for the final test. I actually enjoyed doing it and learned some new things too. I hope I never have to attend traffic school again, but would use Traffic School 4 Busy People if needed.
